text: (Hitobito ni) itte yaru ga ī. `Ten to ji kara, anata gata ni yōdo o kyōkyū suru no wa dare ka. Chōkaku ya shikaku o tsukasadoru no wa dare ka. Mata shinda mono kara, seimei o motarashi,-sei kara shi o motarase rareru no wa dare ka. Mata subete no jibutsu o kisei tōgyo suru no wa daredearu no ka.' Kare-ra wa kanarazu `arrā' to iou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Naze anata gata wa,-nushi o osorenai no ka
